document.full_text: oakland athletics pitcher dallas braden, who tossed a perfect game last year, will have shoulder surgery next week, the major league baseball (mlb) team said on wednesday.
document.title: oakland pitcher braden set for shoulder surgery
lines_and_colors: oakland athletics pitcher dallas braden, who tossed a perfect game last year, will have shoulder surgery next week, the major league baseball (mlb) team said on wednesday.
